casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dejuan Marcus WALL. No. 241P03-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Diane Reeves, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Plain Error Review N.C.G.S. 7A-28(B)(1)(2)(3)(4)":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
